name: Cinccino
flavor_text: Their white fur feels amazing to touch. Their fur repels dust and prevents static electricity from building up.

attacks.name: Amazing Plea
attacks.effect: Choose 2 cards from your discard pile. Then, ask your opponent if you may put them into your hand. If yes, put those cards into your hand. If no, this attack does 80 damage to your opponent’s Active Pokémon.
